product_name: The North Face Etip Gloves - Men's
long_description: Equipped with full finger and palm conductivity, The North Face Etip gloves let you make calls, send texts and surf the web on your touch-screen smartphone without taking off the gloves. Touch-screen-compatible, four-way-stretch fleece provides full palm conductivity so you can control your touch-screen devices with any finger. 5 Dimensional Fit(TM) uses 5 measurements of the hand to construct gloves with an accurate and consistent fit. Radiametric Articulation(TM) improves warmth and blood flow to your fingers by mirroring the natural relaxed curve of the hand. The North Face Etip gloves have silicone grip patterns on the palms to keep your gadgets from slipping out of your hand.
short_description: Equipped with full finger and palm conductivity, The North Face Etip gloves let you make calls, send texts and surf the web on your touch-screen smartphone without taking off the gloves.
